message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I believe it's worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about $11,000? It's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's make this work!
